message.content:
cs.CR, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SE, cs.DS 

This paper is about Android malware detection using machine learning and opcode features. The primary focus is on the security aspect of Android, which falls under the category of "Cryptography and Security" (cs.CR). The paper also utilizes machine learning techniques, which can be categorized under "Artificial Intelligence" (cs.AI). The use of machine learning for feature selection and categorization can also be classified under "Machine Learning" (cs.LG). The paper also discusses the scalability of the approach, which can be categorized under "Software Engineering" (cs.SE). Finally, the paper uses data segmentation techniques for feature selection, which can be categorized under "Data Structures and Algorithms" (cs.DS).
